name: Goland
description:
Goland is a game made in 48 hours on Jam for All 2022. A Jam organized by the students of the Game Design course from the brazilian University Anhembi Monhumbi!

Goland is about Golems... who are.. Landing!

In the game you control a little guy called Jubileu, who works in a Golem factory! Your job is to fabricate Golems for an evil Demon King who wishes to conquer the world!

The gameplay consists on moving around and throwing different ingredients up on Golems who will be falling towards receptors in order to change the type of the Golems so they match the type the receptors are supposed to receive.
